document_data.name: Splurging Sturgeon
document_data.mainbody: The '''Splurging Sturgeon''' was an inn in the city of [[Baldur's Gate]].
document_data.Location & Structure: It was a small two-story building located in the northeast region of the city.
document_data.Description:
Rooms were spartan and the sheets threadbare, and the inn had a rowdy atmosphere, but for all that it was decent and cheap.

As of [[1482 DR]], the Splurging Sturgeon served as a popular location for seafood dishes from around Faerun.
document_data.History: The Splurging Sturgeon was in operation by [[1358 DR]],
